sentences.sContent: Turmeric -- the herb that gives a curry its distinctive yellow color -- is also an antiseptic with anti-inflammatory properties.
sentences.sContent_eng: Turmeric -- the herb that gives a curry its distinctive yellow color -- is also an antiseptic with anti-inflammatory properties.
sentences.sCn: 姜黄，就是赋予咖喱那独一无二的黄色的草本植物，同时也是一种能够消炎的杀菌剂。

synos.tran: [助剂]防腐的，[药]抗菌的；非常整洁的

remMethod.val: anti(反) + sept(菌) + ic → 杀菌剂

trans.tranCn: 防腐的, 杀菌的, 消过毒的
